1.text: Add ¼ cup (60 ml) of clear glue if the slime is made with liquid starch.

2.text: Use baking soda to thicken slime that is made with saline solution.

3.text: Add more cornstarch if you are making cornstarch and dish soap slime.

4.text: Include more cornstarch to thicken cornstarch and glue slime.

5.text: Add 1 small handful of shaving cream if you are thickening fluffy slime.

6.text: Use ¼ tbsp (0.43 g) of borax if you need to thicken Borax slime.

7.text: Pour out any excess liquid from the container.

8.text: Knead the slime for approximately 5 minutes if it contains glue.

9.text: Freeze the slime for up to 10 minutes if it contains shampoo or soap.
